document_data.mainbody:
Wyvern whiskey was a rare and expensive strong distilled alcoholic drink exported from the mysterious island of Nimbral.
This exquisite whiskeys most notable feature was a wyverns scale floating in every bottle. Due to its high price and rarity, wyvern whiskey was often counterfeited.
In the 1360s DR, wyvern whiskey could be purchased at the House of Good Spirits in Waterdeep. In the , a bottle of wyvern whiskey was kept in the Cloister of Sombre Embrace in the city of Baldurs Gate.
